official_title: Project PLUS- Promoting Lung Cancer Screening Among Screening-Eligible Individuals in Environmentally Burdened Communities Through Enhanced Risk Communication
inclusion_criteria:
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 50 Years
Must have maximum age of 80 Years
exclusion_criteria:
Patient interview participants are excluded if:

a. They are not eligible for lung cancer screening.

Pilot trial participants are excluded if they:

1. Do not meet inclusion criteria;
2. Participated in patient interviews.
